definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: This principle can be extended to other angularity error evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 文中的评定原理可扩展到其他倾斜度误差的评定。

sentences.english: If measured value is much less, gradient can be a little bigger.
sentences.chinese: 当被测参数为较小的差压值时，倾斜度可再稍大一点。

sentences.english: The shelves in the living room were designed to follow the diagonal of the wall.
sentences.chinese: 客厅的架子设计成顺应着墙面的倾斜度。

sentences.english: Pluto's track mostly was separated from the ecliptic surface, the gradient has amounted to 17.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星的轨道大都脱离了黄道面，倾斜度达17度。

sentences.english: How far does it lean? Nearly five times farther than the Leaning Tower of Pisa in Italy。
sentences.chinese: 其倾斜度几乎是意大利比萨斜塔倾斜度的5倍。

sentences.english: How far does it lean? Nearly five times farther than the Leaning Tower of Pisa in Italy。
sentences.chinese: 其倾斜度几乎是意大利比萨斜塔倾斜度的5倍。

definition: dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
arched/convex curve surface/camber (slightly arched road surface)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
